thread.title: North, South Korea to hold summit on April 27 - Seoul

title: North, South Korea to hold summit on April 27 - Seoul
text:
March 29, 2018 / 6:02 AM / Updated 19 minutes ago North, South Korea to hold summit on April 27 - Seoul Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
SEOUL (Reuters) - North and South Korea will hold their first summit in more than a decade on April 27, South Korean government officials who held high-level talks with their North Korean counterparts on Thursday said. A concrete border is seen as a South Korean soldier stands guard at the truce village of Panmunjom, South Korea July 19, 2017. REUTERS/Kim Hong-Ji 
The two Koreas had agreed earlier this month to hold such a summit at the border truce village of Panmunjom when South Korean President Moon Jae-in sent a delegation to Pyongyang to meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. Reporting by Christine Kim; Editing by Kim Coghill
